Title: Antalya Solid Wood Hand-Painted Chest Of Drawer

Details.Dimensions:: H : 30, W : 36, D : 14 (All Dimension in Inches)

Description: Mudramark takes inspiration from our rich cultural heritage and ingenious art. Mudramark proudly ushers in the best handcrafted furniture from across India and brings it closer to you. Carefully curated to give your homes an ethnic touch, each creation is a piece de resistance that gives your space a definitive personality. Traditional Style takes inspiration from indigenous arts and craft originating from the Indian sub-continent and certain style periods pertaining to the early Baroque and French eras. Traditional furniture is synonymous with artistic embellishments, contrasting inlays, plush fabrics, decorative trims, crown moldings and intricate details. A chest of drawers, also called a bureau, is a type of cabinet that has multiple parallel, horizontal drawers usually stacked one above another. Chests of drawers have traditionally been used for storing clothing, especially underwear, socks, and other items not normally hung in or otherwise stored in a closet. They are usually placed in a bedroom for this purpose but can actually be used to store anything that will fit inside.
